release.author: Thorsten Kamann
release.information: Third version of the oAW JavaBeans Cartridge and can be found at Fornax-Platform. It's based on the 4.1.1 release of the openArchitectureWare-Framework.

release.author: Ron Haus
release.information: This is the initial release of the OpenUSS Javabasic Cartridge for openArchitectureWare. It is adjusted to the needs of OpenUSS 3.0.
release.changelog: Added the ability to handle the OpenUSS datatypes. Removed the initialization of attributes with no default values.
release.restrictions: Typed collections are not supported. Configuration of class names for Interfaces, Abstract and Impl classes is not supported.
release.dependency: This release was created using the 4.1.1 release of the openArchitectureWare-Framework, Eclipse UML 2.0.1 and Eclipse EMF Ecore 2.2.1. It generates outputs conform to Hibernate 3.2.2.
